DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate contraceptive efficacy oral contraceptive contain combination LNG 90 mg/EE 20 mg continuous-use regimen evaluate safety compare LNG 100 mg/EE 20 mg 21 day follow 7-day hormone-free interval cyclic regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Levonorgestrel Ethinyl Estradiol Oral Contraception
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman age 18 49 year willing rely upon combination birth control pill method contraception . Women must sexually active risk become pregnant . Women must regular ( 21 35 day ) menstrual cycle 3month period precede study visit 1 . High blood pressure Age great 34 smoke 15 cigarette per day . Depression require hospitalization associate suicidal ideation within last 3 year .
